metadata.title: USN-6743-3 -- Linux kernel (Azure) vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Several security issues were discovered in the Linux kernel. An attacker could possibly use these to compromise the system. This update corrects flaws in the following subsystems:   - JFS file system;   - BPF subsystem;   - Netfilter; (CVE-2023-52600, CVE-2024-26589, CVE-2024-26591, CVE-2024-26581, CVE-2023-52603)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6743-3` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-azure-6.5-cloud-tools-6.5.0-1019 - 6.5.0-1019.20~22.04.1 linux-azure-6.5-headers-6.5.0-1019 - 6.5.0-1019.20~22.04.1 linux-azure-6.5-tools-6.5.0-1019 - 6.5.0-1019.20~22.04.1 linux-buildinfo-6.5.0-1019-azure - 6.5.0-1019.20~22.04.1 linux-cloud-tools-6.5.0-1019-azure - 6.5.0-1019.20~22.04.1 linux-headers-6.5.0-1019-azure - 6.5.0-1019.20~22.04.1 linux-image-6.5.0-1019-azure - 6.5.0-1019.20~22.04.1 linux-image-6.5.0-1019-azure-fde - 6.5.0-1019.20~22.04.1 linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1019-azure - 6.5.0-1019.20~22.04.1 linux-modules-6.5.0-1019-azure - 6.5.0-1019.20~22.04.1 linux-modules-extra-6.5.0-1019-azure - 6.5.0-1019.20~22.04.1 linux-tools-6.5.0-1019-azure - 6.5.0-1019.20~22.04.1 No subscription required  linux-azure - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 linux-azure-edge - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 linux-azure-fde - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 linux-azure-fde-edge - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 linux-cloud-tools-azure - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 linux-cloud-tools-azure-edge - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 linux-headers-azure - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 linux-headers-azure-edge - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 linux-image-azure - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 linux-image-azure-edge - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 linux-image-azure-fde - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 linux-image-azure-fde-edge - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 linux-modules-extra-azure - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 linux-modules-extra-azure-edge - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 linux-tools-azure - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 linux-tools-azure-edge - 6.5.0.1019.20~22.04.1 No subscription required
